actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to require the constitution of advisory committees within each of the several States.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: State Civil Rights Committees Act - Requires the Commission on Civil Rights to establish advisory committees within each State under the Civil Rights Act of 1957 (previously the establishment of such committees was authorized but not required). Defines the term "States" to mean the 50 States, Puerto Rico, the District of Columbia, and the Virgin Islands.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Civil Rights Act of 1957 to require the constitution of advisory committees within each of the several States.
